attributes.action: legislate that any person who receives Benefits for more than 6 months, who have no children or elderly to care for, should be given work that will help the community therefore the monies payed to them then become legitimate wages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are thousands of people who have lived on Benefits for years and who are also moonlighting in jobs to supplement their income that the taxpayers pay them.
It is about time that these people who have no children or elderly person to care for should work. If they will not do it for themselves then the Government should make sure they work for their communities to "earn their keep" as the rest of us do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
